item.title: Search Engine Optimization
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row row_type="2" page_title="page-title-x" blox_padding_top="50" blox_padding_bottom="50" blox_bgcolor="#f7f7f7"][vc_column width="7/12"][distance type="5"][vc_column_text]

Search Engine Optimization

Is the process of affecting the visibility of a website or a web page in a search engine's unpaid results—often referred to as "natural," "organic," or "earned" results. In general, the earlier (or higher ranked on the search results page), and more frequently a site appears in the search results list, the more visitors it will receive from the search engine's users. SEO may target different kinds of search, including image search, local search, video search, academic search, news search and industry-specific vertical search engines.[/vc_column_text][distance type="5"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/12"][vc_single_image image="8964" img_size="full" alignment="right" css_animation="bottom-to-top"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][distance type="5"][maxtitle type="5" heading="1" maxtitle_content="Take Your Business to the next level"][vc_column_text]

EasySeo can increase the search engine rank and site traffic of any company. The expertise offered by its technical and copywriting staff enables EasySeo to successfully meet the needs of companies with complex websites in competitive industries.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/12"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/12"][distance type="5"][distance type="4"][vc_column_text]

Analyze a web site

We first analyze a web site, followed by a step-by-step plan to have the website communicate keywords more effectively to search engines. Our ultimate goal is to get our clients more visitors and higher conversion of sales and leads.[/vc_column_text][distance type="2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="6/12"][vc_single_image image="9755" img_size="full"][distance][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="6/12"][distance type="2"][vc_single_image image="9368" img_size="full"][distance][/vc_column][vc_column width="6/12"][distance type="5"][vc_column_text]

On-Page & Off-Page Optimization

The goal of on page and off page optimization is to generate a theme consistent with your targeted keywords. The search engine is a robot, not a human ... and therefore, you must follow our proven process to educate the robot so that it brings your website up when your potential customers are searching for specific business related keywords.[/vc_column_text][distance type="5"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][line][distance type="3"][maxtitle type="5" heading="1" maxtitle_content="HOW WE DO"][vc_column_text]

Before beginning a search engine optimization (SEO) project, it is important to understand the process involved in an effective SEO campaign. EasySeo caters to clients who require an intensive, full-service approach to search engine marketing.

[/vc_column_text][distance][our_process process_item="%5B%7B%22process_title%22%3A%22%3Cstrong%3EKEYWORD%3C%2Fstrong%3E%20RESEARCH%22%2C%22process_content%22%3A%22Keyword%20density%20tells%20you%20how%20often%20a%20search%20term%20appears%20in%20a%20text%20in%20relation%20to%20the%20total%20number%20of%20words%20it%20contains%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-key%22%7D%2C%7B%22process_title%22%3A%22%3Cstrong%3EONSITE%3C%2Fstrong%3E%20OPTIMIZATION%22%2C%22process_content%22%3A%22Onpage%20optimization%20refers%20to%20all%20measures%20that%20can%20be%20taken%20directly%20within%20the%20website%20in%20order%20to%20improve%20its%20position%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-flask%22%7D%2C%7B%22process_title%22%3A%22%3Cstrong%3ELINK%3C%2Fstrong%3E%20BUILDING%22%2C%22process_content%22%3A%22In%20the%20field%20of%20SEO%2C%20link%20building%20describes%20actions%20aimed%20at%20increasing%20the%20number%20and%20quality%20of%20inbound%20links%20to%20a%20webpage%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-anchor%22%7D%2C%7B%22process_title%22%3A%22%3Cstrong%3EREPORTING%3C%2Fstrong%3E%20AND%20ANALYSIS%22%2C%22process_content%22%3A%22Our%20SEO%20review%20consists%20of%20several%20factors%20like%20a%20content%2C%20linking%20structure%2C%20social%20media%20efforts%2C%20and%20its%20trust%20on%20the%20internet%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-bar-chart%22%7D%5D"][distance item.title: Local Business Marketing
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row row_type="2" page_title="page-title-x" blox_padding_top="50" blox_padding_bottom="50" blox_bgcolor="#f7f7f7"][vc_column width="7/12"][distance type="5"][vc_column_text]

Local Business Marketing

Local marketing is a crucial aspect of a successful, comprehensive Internet marketing strategy. For the business with multiple locations or the corporation seeking more local customers, a traditional approach to SEO won’t be enough; in fact, marketing to a targeted local audience requires its own unique set of strategies. When done correctly, local online marketing allows businesses to improve their branding, positively engage with their community, increase customer loyalty and secure higher conversion rates. [/vc_column_text][distance type="5"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/12"][distance type="2"][vc_single_image image="9056" img_size="full" alignment="right" css_animation="bottom-to-top"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][distance type="5"][maxtitle type="5" maxtitle_content="Service Process"][vc_column_text]

The following chart is a summary of each local marketing technique and we dive into each category in detail below.

[/vc_column_text][distance][our_process process_item="%5B%7B%22process_title%22%3A%22%3Cstrong%3EWEBSITE%3C%2Fstrong%3E%20OPTIMIZATION%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-laptop%22%7D%2C%7B%22process_title%22%3A%22BUSINESS%20%3Cstrong%3ELISTINGS%3C%2Fstrong%3E%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-bars%22%7D%2C%7B%22process_title%22%3A%22%3Cstrong%3ECITATION%3C%2Fstrong%3E%20BUILDING%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-quote-left%22%7D%2C%7B%22process_title%22%3A%22REVIEWS%20%26%20%3Cstrong%3ERATINGS%20%3C%2Fstrong%3E%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-star%22%7D%2C%7B%22process_title%22%3A%22PPC%20%26%20%3Cstrong%3ECALL%20TRACKING%3C%2Fstrong%3E%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-phone%22%7D%5D"][distance][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][distance type="5"][maxtitle type="5" maxtitle_content="Our Local Marketing Services"][distance][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][distance type="4"][vc_column_text]

Local Search Engine Optimization (SEO)

Implementing a local SEO campaign is one of the first steps we take when launching a client’s online marketing strategy. We first ensure that a client’s website is properly and fully indexed by the major search engines that determine rankings, which involves submitting an XML sitemap to platforms like Google Webmaster. We specialize in optimizing Google+ Local Business Pages, with appropriate images, video, description and other related factors that can get you in the top of search result and attract highly targeted customers to your business.[/vc_column_text][button btn_content="UNDERSTAND MORE" url="http://webnus.biz/themes/easyweb/seo/search-engine-optimization/"][distance type="2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][distance][vc_single_image image="9755" img_size="full"][distance type="2"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][distance type="2"][vc_single_image image="9460" img_size="full" alignment="center"][distance type="2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][distance type="4"][vc_column_text]

Local Business Directory Listings

EasyWeb also creates client listings in numerous online business directories like Yelp! and Google+ Local to significantly boost a company’s local online presence. Our primary goal is to make every client’s company more visible and accessible and, despite the decline in popularity of the physical phone book, an online business directory is now the best method for achieving both of these objectives.[/vc_column_text][distance type="2"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][distance type="4"][vc_column_text]

Local PPC

Local Pay per Click is the fastest way to attract ready to buy prospects to your local business and convert them in to recurring customers. Local PPC Ads are only shown to people who are searching within a very Limited Geographic Area, mostly within 50 miles radios of your shop or office. You only get high targeted traffic to your website, from people who are ready to buy right now. It’s damn effective, less expensive & gives positive results.[/vc_column_text][button btn_content="UNDERSTAND MORE" url="http://webnus.biz/themes/easyweb/seo/pay-per-click/"][distance type="2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="9082" img_size="full" alignment="center"][distance type="2"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][distance type="3"][vc_single_image image="9072" img_size="full" alignment="center"][distance type="2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][distance type="2"][vc_column_text]

Social Media Marketing

Your customers use social media, and you need to be there – interacting with them – to influence their purchase decisions. Social media marketing is the engine that pushes your brand to the right audience. We help you with all the technology that you need to find and interact with your customers. We help you choose channels and media platforms that are best suited for your audience.
  • Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn interconnect
  • Blogs
  • Digital Video
  • iPhone Apps
  • Facebook Apps
[/vc_column_text][button btn_content="UNDERSTAND MORE" url="http://webnus.biz/themes/easyweb/seo/social-media-marketing/"][distance type="3"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type="2" blox_bgcolor="#f9f9f9"][vc_column][distance type="4"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][distance type="2"][maxcounter type="2" count="6" suffix="x" title="Growth in keyword ranking" color="#a2d67e" icon="sl-key"][distance][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][distance type="2"][maxcounter type="2" count="398" suffix="%" title="Increase in Organic traffic" color="#fb8b4b" icon="sl-globe-alt"][distance][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][distance type="2"][maxcounter type="2" count="1105" suffix="%" title="Increase in Top 10 ranking" color="#b78ce2" icon="sl-rocket"][distance][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][distance type="2"][maxcounter type="2" count="129" suffix="%" title="Increase in Visit duration" color="#19d1e5" icon="sl-hourglass"][distance][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][distance type="3"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][distance][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row blox_class="cntborder"][vc_column width="5/12" css=".vc_custom_1448871957642{background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}"][distance][webnus-divider type="7" lspan="What" rspan="Clients Say" color="#77da55"][distance][vc_column_text]We do not only provide SEO and Internet marketing services but we also offer a wide array of related services such as SEO friendly web design, pay per click, affiliate marketing, website audits, social media optimization, branding and several others.[/vc_column_text][distance][testimonial_slider type="penta"][testimonial_item name="John Anderson" img="8876" subtitle="Risotto Co" testimonial_content="One of the best theme I have ever used. Every minor detail has been taken care of. Clean, Modern Design can be used for any type of website. Excellent template." second_social="instagram"][testimonial_item name="Lida Smith" img="8880" subtitle="Mexin Co" testimonial_content="Lida has assisted me with questions in regards to web hosting and has offered me more insight in half an hour than my current host did in all the years I have been with them." first_social="instagram" second_social="linkedin" third_social="vimeo" fourth_social="pinterest"][/testimonial_slider][distance type="2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/12" css=".vc_custom_1448868540278{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="6/12"][distance][webnus-divider type="7" lspan="Request" rspan="A Free Quote" color="#77da55"][distance][contact-form-7 id="31"][distance type="5"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type="2" blox_padding_top="40" blox_padding_bottom="40" blox_bgcolor="#f9f9f9"][vc_column][distance type="2"][portfolio-carousel title="CASE STUDIES"][distance][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Social Media Marketing
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row row_type="2" page_title="page-title-x" blox_padding_top="50" blox_padding_bottom="50" blox_bgcolor="#f7f7f7"][vc_column width="7/12"][distance type="5"][vc_column_text]

Social Media Marketing

A powerful tool of communication, social media allows companies to reach their customers where they are, while also characterizing their brands and expanding their customer base. If done correctly, social media marketing can also increase the efficacy of other marketing techniques – including SEO and SEM – by helping build natural links, and drive traffic, awareness, brand recognition and goodwill. If you have been struggling with social media strategy, management, or advertising we can help. [/vc_column_text][distance type="5"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/12"][vc_single_image image="9072" img_size="full" alignment="right" css_animation="bottom-to-top"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][distance][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][distance type="2"][maxtitle type="5" heading="1" maxtitle_content="Our Services"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][distance type="2"][iconbox type="18" icon_title="Social Media Strategy Development" iconbox_content="We provide a range of high-value social media consultancy services through which we help you to achieve tangible results from their social media activities." icon_name="sl-puzzle"][distance][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][distance type="2"][iconbox type="18" icon_title="Social Media Advertising Management" iconbox_content="Our social media advertising services are proven to accelerate growth. By advertising through social media, 100% of our clients have seen results." icon_name="sl-layers"][distance][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][distance type="2"][iconbox type="18" icon_title="Social Media Content Creation" iconbox_content="We provide a range of social media writing and posting services to help you directly or indirectly market your offerings through online social media." icon_name="sl-pencil"][distance][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][distance][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][distance type="5"][vc_column_text]

What is Social Media Marketing?

Social media marketing, or SMM, is a form of internet marketing that implements various social media networks in order to achieve marketing communication and branding goals. Social media marketing primarily covers activities involving social sharing of content, videos, and images for marketing purposes, as well as paid social media advertising.[/vc_column_text][distance type="2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="9755" img_size="full" alignment="center"][distance type="2"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][distance type="2"][vc_single_image image="9749" img_size="full" alignment="center"][distance type="2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][distance type="2"][distance type="5"][vc_column_text]

Why do you need a social media management?

 
Your customers are on social media.
Regardless of what industry your company is in, your customers are using social media on a daily basis. It is important that you keep them engaged and connected to your brand so that you’re always their first option.  
There are people searching for your company.
If your company is offering a product or service, you can bet that there are people talking about it and looking for companies that provide it. Our social media management service will help your business to join the conversation and generate new leads.  
People are talking about your company on social media.
You need to listen to what your customers are saying about your company on social media and respond to their concerns. Our social media management services focus on highlighting the positive aspects of what your company has to offer and respond sincerely to negative remarks.  
Companies deserve expert social media management.
Most business owners and marketing managers do not have time to manage all of their social media channels. Each member of our firm received their certification in social media management and our agency can help you reach your marketing goals and a new customer base.[/vc_column_text][distance type="2"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][distance type="3"][maxtitle type="5" heading="1" maxtitle_content="Our Process"][distance][our_process process_item="%5B%7B%22process_title%22%3A%22%3Cstrong%3EStrategy%3C%2Fstrong%3E%20Development%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-cubes%22%7D%2C%7B%22process_title%22%3A%22%3Cstrong%3EAdvertising%3C%2Fstrong%3E%20Management%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-bullhorn%22%7D%2C%7B%22process_title%22%3A%22%3Cstrong%3ECommunity%3C%2Fstrong%3E%20Management%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-male%22%7D%2C%7B%22process_title%22%3A%22%3Cstrong%3EEffective%20Content%3C%2Fstrong%3E%20Creation%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-pencil%22%7D%2C%7B%22process_title%22%3A%22%3Cstrong%3EMeasurement%3C%2Fstrong%3E%20%26%20Reporting%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-area-chart%22%7D%5D"][distance type="5"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type="2" blox_image="9540" blox_padding_bottom="40" blox_dark="true" blox_bgcolor="#746aca"][vc_column width="1/6"][distance type="2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][distance type="5"][distance type="2"][vc_column_text css_animation="appear"]

How can we help you?

We are a sociable bunch and our new business comes primarily from recommendations & referrals from clients & friends who know how we work. We don’t think that salesmen should do all the talking for us and so we recommend that you speak directly to our clients to understand who we are and what we do. Our social media pricing is completely bespoke and is based on your current situation and your objectives.

[/vc_column_text][distance type="4"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][distance type="5"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][distance][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row blox_class="cntborder"][vc_column width="5/12" css=".vc_custom_1448871957642{background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}"][distance][webnus-divider type="7" lspan="What" rspan="Clients Say" color="#77da55"][distance][vc_column_text]We do not only provide SEO and Internet marketing services but we also offer a wide array of related services such as SEO friendly web design, pay per click, affiliate marketing, website audits, social media optimization, branding and several others.[/vc_column_text][distance][testimonial_slider type="penta"][testimonial_item name="John Anderson" img="8876" subtitle="Risotto Co" testimonial_content="One of the best theme I have ever used. Every minor detail has been taken care of. Clean, Modern Design can be used for any type of website. Excellent template." second_social="instagram"][testimonial_item name="Lida Smith" img="8880" subtitle="Mexin Co" testimonial_content="Lida has assisted me with questions in regards to web hosting and has offered me more insight in half an hour than my current host did in all the years I have been with them." first_social="instagram" second_social="linkedin" third_social="vimeo" fourth_social="pinterest"][/testimonial_slider][distance type="2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/12" css=".vc_custom_1448868540278{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="6/12"][distance][webnus-divider type="7" lspan="Request" rspan="A Free Quote" color="#77da55"][distance][contact-form-7 id="31"][distance type="5"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type="2" blox_padding_top="40" blox_padding_bottom="40" blox_bgcolor="#f9f9f9"][vc_column][distance type="2"][portfolio-carousel title="CASE STUDIES"][distance][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Email Marketing
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row row_type="2" page_title="page-title-x" blox_padding_top="50" blox_padding_bottom="50" blox_bgcolor="#f7f7f7"][vc_column width="7/12"][distance type="5"][vc_column_text]

Email Marketing

Email marketing is directly marketing a commercial message to a group of people using email. In its broadest sense, every email sent to a potential or current customer could be considered email marketing. It usually involves using email to send ads, request business, or solicit sales or donations, and is meant to build loyalty, trust, or brand awareness.[/vc_column_text][distance type="5"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/12"][vc_single_image image="9075" img_size="full" alignment="right" css_animation="bottom-to-top"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][distance type="5"][maxtitle type="5" heading="1" maxtitle_content="What We Do "][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][distance type="2"][iconbox icon_title="Responsive Email Design " iconbox_content="We will code your email in HTML and CSS that utilizes media queries to help achieve optimal formatting across all devices of all sizes." icon_color="#77da55" icon_name="sl-screen-tablet"][distance type="2"][iconbox icon_title="Automated Email Marketing" iconbox_content="Our marketing automation experts will help you grow your sales and convert more leads, all while saving you time, money and heartache. " icon_color="#77da55" icon_name="sl-layers"][distance type="2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][distance type="2"][iconbox icon_title="Email Copywriting" iconbox_content="Our email copywriting service will enable you to generate bigger profits from the marketing channel with the highest ROI." icon_color="#77da55" icon_name="sl-note"][distance type="2"][iconbox icon_title="Fully Managed Email Marketing" iconbox_content="Our fully managed service includes the creation of two email campaigns per month, all professionally designed and written for you." icon_color="#77da55" icon_name="sl-equalizer"][distance type="2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][distance type="2"][iconbox icon_title="Campaign Production & Deployment" iconbox_content="We focus on helping you maximize the performance of your business with behaviorally targeted, triggered communications." icon_color="#77da55" icon_name="sl-envelope-letter"][distance type="2"][iconbox icon_title="Email List Cleaning" iconbox_content="We’ll weed out your old and tired email addresses and make sure your list is squeaky clean and ready to score deliverability points." icon_color="#77da55" type="5"][maxtitle type="5" heading="1" maxtitle_content="Our Email Marketing features "][distance type="2"][/vc_column][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][distance type="4"][vc_column_text]

Create an Email Newsletter

Design engaging email marketing campaigns with simple drag-and-drop tools. Your design is guaranteed to look amazing in every inbox, on every device. We provide you with an unprecedented level of comfort and ease when creating and sending email campaigns.[/vc_column_text][distance type="3"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="9407" img_size="full" alignment="center"][distance type="3"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][distance type="2"][/vc_column][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="9408" img_size="full" alignment="center"][distance type="3"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][distance type="3"][vc_column_text]

Send Your Campaign and Ensure Delivery

Email campaigns can be sent at your convenience as we have it stored on the cloud, which means you can access it at anytime and anywhere using your desktop, tablet or iPhone. Schedule your campaign, or send it immediately. Check delivery in our reports and stats immediately. High delivery rates are guaranteed as we have feedback loops with all major internet service providers.[/vc_column_text][distance type="3"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][distance type="2"][/vc_column][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][distance type="3"][vc_column_text]

A/B Split Test

A/B Split Testing helps you better understand subscriber preferences, gain insight into campaign success, and effectively track campaigns over time. Split testing will identify best practices for your unique audience, the variables determining your open and conversion rates and refine segmentation. Test your subject line, from name, email content, CTA and sending day/time.[/vc_column_text][distance type="3"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="9409" img_size="full" alignment="center"][distance type="3"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][distance type="2"][/vc_column][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="9410" img_size="full" alignment="center"][distance type="3"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][distance type="3"][vc_column_text]

Track Campaigns. Monitor Reports

Tracking your email marketing campaign performance is easier with EasyWeb email marketing software. You can easily gain insight into how many recipients opened your email, how many emails bounced, unsubscribe rates and click through stats. EasyWeb offers a variety of ways to analyze and interpret your campaign performance with charts and data to help you improve your campaigns.[/vc_column_text][distance type="3"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][distance type="2"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type="2" blox_bgcolor="#f9f9f9"][vc_column][distance type="4"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][distance type="2"][maxcounter type="2" count="5" suffix="year" title="SINCE WE LAUNCHED" color="#a2d67e" icon="sl-rocket"][distance][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][distance type="2"][maxcounter type="2" count="500" title="SATISFIED USTOMERS" color="#fb8b4b" icon="sl-people"][distance][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][distance type="2"][maxcounter type="2" count="13" suffix="million" title="EMAILS SENT/MONTH" color="#b78ce2" icon="sl-envelope-letter"][distance][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][distance type="2"][maxcounter type="2" count="80" title="DESIGNED TEMPLATES" color="#19d1e5" icon="sl-book-open"][distance][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][distance type="3"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][distance][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row blox_class="cntborder"][vc_column width="5/12" css=".vc_custom_1448871957642{background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}"][distance][webnus-divider type="7" lspan="What" rspan="Clients Say" color="#77da55"][distance][vc_column_text]We do not only provide SEO and Internet marketing services but we also offer a wide array of related services such as SEO friendly web design, pay per click, affiliate marketing, website audits, social media optimization, branding and several others.[/vc_column_text][distance][testimonial_slider type="penta"][testimonial_item name="John Anderson" img="8876" subtitle="Risotto Co" testimonial_content="One of the best theme I have ever used. item.title: Pay Per Click
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row row_type="2" page_title="page-title-x" blox_padding_top="50" blox_padding_bottom="50" blox_bgcolor="#f7f7f7"][vc_column width="7/12"][distance type="5"][vc_column_text]

Pay Per Click

PPC stands for pay-per-click, a model of internet marketing in which advertisers pay a fee each time one of their ads is clicked. Essentially, it’s a way of buying visits to your site, rather than attempting to “earn” those visits organically. Search engine advertising is one of the most popular forms of PPC. It allows advertisers to bid for ad placement in a search engine's sponsored links when someone searches on a keyword that is related to their business offering. [/vc_column_text][distance type="5"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/12"][vc_single_image image="9082" img_size="full" alignment="right" css_animation="bottom-to-top"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][distance type="5"][distance type="3"][vc_column_text]

PPC Management

Platforms such as Google AdWords and Bing Ads are important to your business. With our pay-per-click marketing (PPC) expertise, we can help take your accounts to the next level. We customize strategy and reporting tailored to your needs. We provide the support and guidance you require to accomplish your goal, be it maximizing return on investment, increasing leads, or driving brand awareness.[/vc_column_text][distance type="4"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][distance type="3"][vc_single_image image="9755" img_size="full"][distance type="4"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type="2" blox_padding_top="70" blox_bgcolor="#f7f7f7"][vc_column][maxtitle type="5" maxtitle_content="Our Pay Per Click Services"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type="2" blox_padding_top="1" blox_padding_bottom="15" blox_bgcolor="#f7f7f7"][vc_column width="1/3"][distance type="3"][iconbox icon_title="PPC Audits" iconbox_content="Our PPC Audit process starts from understanding audit objective, coverage and leading to data analysis. " icon_name="sl-eyeglass"][distance type="2"][iconbox icon_title="Bing Advertising" iconbox_content="As advertising service which assist corporation to touch the 129 million incomparable searchers, company pay-per-click service is the key aspect." icon_name="fa-windows"][distance type="4"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][distance type="3"][iconbox icon_title="Social Advertising" iconbox_content="EasySeo can help you with paid social campaigns that can drive your target audience toward much targeted desired actions. " icon_name="sl-rocket"][distance type="2"][iconbox icon_title="Display Advertising" iconbox_content="Your display ads will be targeting an audience that has already indicated an interest in your service or product. " icon_name="fa-bullhorn"][distance type="4"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][distance type="3"][iconbox icon_title="Google AdWords" iconbox_content=" Hiring us gives you the benefit of a full-time AdWords expert without the extra cost of hiring another full-time employee." icon_name="fa-google"][distance type="2"][iconbox icon_title="Remarketing & Retargeting" iconbox_content="Improve ROI and increase conversions by marketing to people who have all ready visited your website. " icon_name="sl-refresh"][distance type="4"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][distance type="4"][vc_single_image image="9723" img_size="full"][distance type="2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][distance type="5"][distance type="5"][vc_column_text]

Brief process of our pay per click campaign:

Our pay-per-click (PPC) management service includes the following components:
  • PPC search campaign strategy
  • Keyword research and selection
  • Ad creative development
  • Campaign set-up
  • Bid management and ROI tracking
  • Landing page optimization and development
  • Campaign management and analysis
[/vc_column_text][distance type="3"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type="2" blox_image="9535" blox_padding_top="15" blox_padding_bottom="10" blox_dark="true" blox_bgcolor="#746aca"][vc_column][distance type="3"][distance type="3"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][vc_column_text css_animation="appear"]

Deliverables

We report monthly on your campaign’s success regarding keyword choice and text choice, and we create a rank report so you know where you rank organically for the keywords you pay for. Additionally, after you review the report, we’ll book a one hour call with the members of your team to explain your campaign’s progress, direction, and answer any questions you may have.

item.title: Content Marketing
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row row_type="2" page_title="page-title-x" blox_padding_top="50" blox_padding_bottom="50" blox_bgcolor="#f7f7f7"][vc_column width="7/12"][distance type="5"][vc_column_text]

Content Marketing

What is content exactly? Content is blogs, infographics, videos, emails, eBooks, social media updates, and the text on your website. Yep, content is everywhere. Which is why it’s so important to have a content marketing strategy that aligns your content with your core values and each of your audiences’ wants, needs, and unique, preferred ways of consuming content.[/vc_column_text][distance type="5"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/12"][distance type="2"][vc_single_image image="9090" img_size="full" alignment="right" css_animation="bottom-to-top"][distance type="2"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][distance type="3"][vc_single_image image="9756" img_size="full"][distance type="3"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/12"][distance type="5"][distance type="2"][vc_column_text]

Why Do You Need Content Marketing?

Buyers are self-directed and content can help satisfy their quest for answers and enable you to direct them to solutions for their business problems. The team at EasySeo Marketing is experts in helping businesses like yours determine how to take your audience from prospects to buyers.[/vc_column_text][distance type="3"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/12"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][distance type="2"][distance type="5"][vc_column_text]

How Can Content Marketing Help You Get More Customers?

Content marketing creates signals across the web that builds credibility and authority with your audience. In addition to the many SEO benefits of content marketing, it can be used as a means to connect on a level with your customers that other digital marketing can’t.[/vc_column_text][distance type="3"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="9096" img_size="full" alignment="center"][distance type="3"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][distance type="2"][vc_single_image image="9724" img_size="full"][distance type="2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][distance type="4"][vc_column_text]

What We Offer:

EasySeo helps clients develop a sustainable, effective, and integrated content marketing strategy. We provide a content marketing strategy consulting service that helps businesses take the necessary steps towards an impactful content. marketing program including:
  • Content marketing strategy development based on your business situation
  • Relevant and Actionable content across all formats and channels including: video, whitepapers, eBooks, blog posts, webinars, case studies, etc.
  • Content placement and distribution – digital PR
  • Content amplification via digital & social media channels – Twitter, Facebook, YouTube etc
  • Content marketing performance analytics and measurement
  • Content marketing technology & tools recommendations

item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row row_type="2" page_title="page-title-x" blox_padding_top="50" blox_padding_bottom="50" blox_bgcolor="#f7f7f7"][vc_column width="7/12"][distance type="5"][vc_column_text]

Mobile Marketing

Mobile Marketing is the latest technology that helps you attract more new customers --customers that spend more money, more frequently!!! We can help you launch a successful mobile marketing campaign to connect, communicate and keep your customers coming through the door again and again. [/vc_column_text][distance type="5"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/12"][vc_single_image image="9093" img_size="full" alignment="right" css_animation="bottom-to-top"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][distance][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][distance type="2"][maxtitle type="5" maxtitle_content="Our Services"][distance][vc_column_text]

Online marketing is considered to be one of the most popular methods of marketing. But the sheer number of mobile users dwarfs the potential of an online marketing campaign. As mobile phone users are more in number, the effectiveness and the eventual success of a mobile marketing campaign would be far stronger than what you could expect from an online marketing campaign, which still is a very popular method of marketing today.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][distance type="3"][iconbox type="8" icon_title="Mobile App Development" iconbox_content="We help you create a seamless experience for your web applications on handheld devices using responsive design, HTML5 and CSS3." icon_name="sl-screen-tablet"][distance][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][distance type="3"][iconbox type="8" icon_title="Mobile Websites services" iconbox_content="As a full-service agency, we offer a range of mobile web services. What we do

EasySeo is a trusted mobile marketing partner to many of the world’s leading brands. Our clients consistently rave about our strategic services which unleash the power of our mobile technology, preference management, and rich analytics platform. Leverage our multi-channel capabilities across SMS, MMS, mobile web, voice, QR codes, and email to create great customer experiences across the entire lifecycle.

item.title: Reputation Management
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row row_type="2" page_title="page-title-x" blox_padding_top="50" blox_padding_bottom="50" blox_bgcolor="#f7f7f7"][vc_column width="7/12"][distance type="5"][vc_column_text]

Reputation Management

Online reputation management is considered important to protect your business from negative feedback. Bad reviews and bad-mouthing about your business can put your business at risk. Online reputation management ensures that all the negative criticism about your company is rubbed off and your reputation is always clean as a clean slate.[/vc_column_text][distance type="5"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/12"][vc_single_image image="9099" img_size="full" alignment="right" css_animation="bottom-to-top"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][distance type="5"][distance type="5"][distance type="3"][vc_column_text]

Reputation is everything

In business, your reputation is everything. Thanks to social media and review sites like Yelp, you can build a great online reputation fast. There's just one problem: The Internet moves fast, and with a few missteps, you can hit rock bottom just as quickly as you rose to that coveted 5-star rating.[/vc_column_text][distance type="2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][distance][vc_single_image image="9755" img_size="full"][distance type="2"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][distance][vc_single_image image="9483" img_size="full"][distance type="2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][distance type="5"][distance type="5"][vc_column_text]

Reputation Consultants

If you currently have an online reputation management problem, our online reputation consultants can provide the tools you need to spot it and quietly remove it from search engines. If you’re lucky enough not to have a brand issue (yet), we’ll introduce you to reputation monitoring software that will help keep you abreast of what’s being said out there about your brand.[/vc_column_text][distance type="2"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][distance type="3"][maxtitle type="5" heading="1" maxtitle_content="Our Process "][vc_column_text]

We offer online reputation management services that include search result removal, suppression, protection and review management

[/vc_column_text][distance][our_process process_item="%5B%7B%22process_title%22%3A%22%3Cstrong%3EEffective%20Search%20Techniques%3C%2Fstrong%3E%22%2C%22process_content%22%3A%22Researching%20and%20identifying%20any%20mention%20of%20your%20company%2C%20name%20or%20brand%20name.%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-search%22%7D%2C%7B%22process_title%22%3A%22%3Cstrong%3ERemoval%20of%20Undesirable%20Information%3C%2Fstrong%3E%22%2C%22process_content%22%3A%22We%20have%20fine%20tuned%20the%20way%20we%20remove%20negative%20feedback%20from%20the%20top%20ten%20search%20results%20in%20Google%2C%20MSN%2C%20and%20Yahoo.%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-trash%22%7D%2C%7B%22process_title%22%3A%22%3Cstrong%3EReplacement%20with%20Positive%20Information%3C%2Fstrong%3E%22%2C%22process_content%22%3A%22We%20help%20keep%20the%20positive%20reviews%20in%20the%20spotlight%20and%20let%20any%20negative%20reviews%20disappear%20into%20oblivion.%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-check-circle%22%7D%2C%7B%22process_title%22%3A%22%3Cstrong%3EOngoing%20Monitoring%20Activities%3C%2Fstrong%3E%22%2C%22process_content%22%3A%22Because%20new%20posts%20can%20appear%20at%20any%20time%2C%20we'll%20keep%20an%20eye%20on%20what's%20being%20said%20about%20your%20company.%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-bar-chart%22%7D%5D"][distance type="4"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type="2" blox_bgcolor="#f7f7f7"][vc_column width="1/2"][distance type="5"][distance type="4"][vc_column_text]

Our Expertise

We know that different businesses and individuals have distinct reputation management needs. Our staff researched and reviewed dozens of reputation management services, and came up with the ones we think are best for both businesses and individuals. We offer services to governments, and businesses, both small and large from a wide variety of industries and fields. Our exclusive solutions are focused not just on public perception, but also on our understanding of buying drivers for specific products. Public perception is vitally important, but our proprietary solutions are also focused on what drives sales for your products or services.[/vc_column_text][distance type="5"][distance type="2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][distance type="5"][distance type="4"][vc_column_text]

What We Provide

Our skilled team uses reverse search engine optimization to fix negative and unwanted Internet information about you or your business. By partnering with our company, you are guaranteed a positive and credible Internet reputation. The Internet reputation services we provide include:
  • Removing negative Internet news stories, including slander;
  • Removing ratings and bad reviews;
  • Fixing results from Google, Yahoo, and Bing search engines;
  • Removing information on court cases and litigation;
  • Deleting Rip off Reports
  • Removing cheater websites
[/vc_column_text][distance type="5"][distance type="2"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][distance][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row blox_class="cntborder"][vc_column width="5/12" css=".vc_custom_1448871957642{background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}"][distance][webnus-divider type="7" lspan="What" rspan="Clients Say" color="#77da55"][distance][vc_column_text]We do not only provide SEO and Internet marketing services but we also offer a wide array of related services such as SEO friendly web design, pay per click, affiliate marketing, website audits, social media optimization, branding and several others.[/vc_column_text][distance][testimonial_slider type="penta"][testimonial_item name="John Anderson" img="8876" subtitle="Risotto Co" testimonial_content="One of the best theme I have ever used. Every minor detail has been taken care of. Clean, Modern Design can be used for any type of website. Excellent template." second_social="instagram"][testimonial_item name="Lida Smith" img="8880" subtitle="Mexin Co" testimonial_content="Lida has assisted me with questions in regards to web hosting and has offered me more insight in half an hour than my current host did in all the years I have been with them." first_social="instagram" second_social="linkedin" third_social="vimeo" fourth_social="pinterest"][/testimonial_slider][distance type="2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/12" css=".vc_custom_1448868540278{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="6/12"][distance][webnus-divider type="7" lspan="Request" rspan="A Free Quote" color="#77da55"][distance][contact-form-7 id="31"][distance type="5"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type="2" blox_padding_top="40" blox_padding_bottom="40" blox_bgcolor="#f9f9f9"][vc_column][distance type="2"][portfolio-carousel title="CASE STUDIES"][distance][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Affiliate Marketing
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row row_type="2" page_title="page-title-x" blox_padding_top="50" blox_padding_bottom="50" blox_bgcolor="#f7f7f7"][vc_column width="7/12"][distance type="5"][vc_column_text]

Affiliate Marketing

Affiliate marketing is the process of earning a commission by promoting other people's (or company's) products. You find a product you like, promote it to others, and earn a piece of the profit for each sale that you make. Affiliate marketing is a cost effective means of combining established marketing techniques with technology for business success.[/vc_column_text][distance type="5"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/12"][vc_single_image image="9102" img_size="full" alignment="right" css_animation="bottom-to-top"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][distance][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][distance][vc_single_image image="9757" img_size="full" alignment="center"][distance type="2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][distance type="4"][vc_column_text]

How Does Affiliate Marketing Work?

Affiliate marketing is generally defined as a referral program that gives commissions those who successfully refer a potential client or leads to your site. Sometimes called an advertising affiliate Internet program, it is one of the most cost-effective and efficient means to drive online revenue. The more people who are advertising your company, services, or products online, the more successful you will be. An affiliate marketing is essentially a sales force compensated based on their performance. Creating an affiliate marketing program will allow you to focus your attention on other aspects of your business.[/vc_column_text][distance type="2"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][distance type="2"][maxtitle type="5" heading="1" maxtitle_content="Our Values"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/4"][distance type="2"][iconbox type="10" icon_title="Effective strategies" iconbox_content="An individual map is created according to the customized needs of the clients for achieving scalable results." icon_name="sl-bulb"][distance][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][distance type="2"][iconbox type="10" icon_title="Branding Transparency" iconbox_content="Our brand network is 100% transparent - you will always know where and when your ads are showing." icon_name="sl-trophy"][distance][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][distance type="2"][iconbox type="10" icon_title="Proactive Management" iconbox_content="We’ll help recruit new affiliates and communicate with existing ones to ensure results are maximized." icon_name="sl-layers"][distance][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][distance type="2"][iconbox type="10" icon_title="Cost Effectiveness" iconbox_content="Our goal is to provide Affiliate Marketing services, which maximize your ROI and keep your costs down." icon_name="li_banknote"][distance][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][line][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="7/12"][distance type="4"][vc_column_text]

What we do

  • Help select the right affiliate networks that meet your goals
  • Set up the affiliate program on the chosen networks
  • Promote your affiliate program; review the affiliate application & signup new affiliates
  • Create marketing collaterals for affiliates - images, banners & catalogs
  • Monthly, weekly & ad hoc affiliate communication
  • Set up data feeds for affiliates
  • Analyze individual affiliate's performance and communicate with them to help them
  • Periodic reports on the performance of the affiliate marketing channel
[/vc_column_text][distance][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/12"][vc_single_image image="9755" img_size="full" alignment="center"][distance][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][distance][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type="2" blox_padding_bottom="40" blox_dark="true" blox_bgcolor="#746aca"][vc_column width="1/6"][distance type="2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][distance type="5"][distance type="2"][vc_column_text css_animation="appear"]

Why choose us?

Our agency-level relationships span over all major affiliate networks, including Commission Junction, Impact Radius, eBay Enterprise, CAKE and LinkShare. These relationships help to ensure that the best rates are negotiated for our clients. Excellent rates, combined with our methodical approach to the Affiliate selection process, enables Rise Interactive to partner with publishers that embrace our client's brands, drive conversions and achieve ROI goals.

[/vc_column_text][distance type="4"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][distance type="5"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][distance][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row blox_class="cntborder"][vc_column width="5/12" css=".vc_custom_1448871957642{background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}"][distance][webnus-divider type="7" lspan="What" rspan="Clients Say" color="#77da55"][distance][vc_column_text]We do not only provide SEO and Internet marketing services but we also offer a wide array of related services such as SEO friendly web design, pay per click, affiliate marketing, website audits, social media optimization, branding and several others.[/vc_column_text][distance][testimonial_slider type="penta"][testimonial_item name="John Anderson" img="8876" subtitle="Risotto Co" testimonial_content="One of the best theme I have ever used. Every minor detail has been taken care of. Clean, Modern Design can be used for any type of website. Excellent template." second_social="instagram"][testimonial_item name="Lida Smith" img="8880" subtitle="Mexin Co" testimonial_content="Lida has assisted me with questions in regards to web hosting and has offered me more insight in half an hour than my current host did in all the years I have been with them." first_social="instagram" second_social="linkedin" third_social="vimeo" fourth_social="pinterest"][/testimonial_slider][distance type="2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/12" css=".vc_custom_1448868540278{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="6/12"][distance][webnus-divider type="7" lspan="Request" rspan="A Free Quote" color="#77da55"][distance][contact-form-7 id="31"][distance type="5"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type="2" blox_padding_top="40" blox_padding_bottom="40" blox_bgcolor="#f9f9f9"][vc_column][distance type="2"][portfolio-carousel title="CASE STUDIES"][distance][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Online presence analysis
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row row_type="2" page_title="page-title-x" blox_padding_top="50" blox_padding_bottom="50" blox_bgcolor="#f7f7f7"][vc_column width="7/12"][distance type="5"][vc_column_text]

Online Presence Analysis

The Online Presence Analysis lets us look into how your business is doing online. We will look at your website design, functionality, and content. We will also look into your ideal keywords and locations in respect to your competitors in relation to your competition. We will analyze your web presence in great detail, so that you will ultimately be able to pinpoint your strengths and weaknesses.[/vc_column_text][distance type="5"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/12"][distance type="2"][vc_single_image image="9358" img_size="full" alignment="right" css_animation="bottom-to-top"][distance type="2"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][distance type="3"][vc_single_image image="9756" img_size="full"][distance type="3"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][distance][distance type="5"][vc_column_text]

Key part of online marketing strategy

Any business, big or small, should have the online presence expansion as a key part of their online marketing strategy. Through an active online presence, you will increase visibility and build your brand’s reputation. This allows you to reach out to potential visitors who continue to inquire about your products and services. In order to see exactly where your brand stands with its online presence in your industry, we offer what we call an Online Presence Analysis. This analysis will help us determine how well your business is seen among potential visitors as compared to your major competitors.[/vc_column_text][distance][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type="2" page_title="page-title-x" blox_padding_top="40" blox_padding_bottom="50" blox_bgcolor="#f7f7f7"][vc_column width="7/12"][distance type="3"][vc_column_text]

What Does an Online Presence Analysis include?

  • On-page and Off-page analysis
  • Competition comparison
  • Content reporting
  • Where you stand when searching keywords related to your website
  • Social Media presence
  • Brand’s visibility among search engines
  • Design and functionality of your website
  • Competitor analysis
  • Competitor analysis
  • Web-traffic analysis & increasing traffic
  • Ideas to gain more business

Your Online Presence Evaluation Consists Of:

Why Online Presence Analysis is Important:

If you have never monitored your presence on the Internet to see how well your marketing activities are working, you should do one now to set a baseline for measuring your improvement over the next few months. As you increase your visibility, great things can happen for your business. What have I missed? Is there something else we should include in this analysis? let us know how well you are doing. item.title: Conversion Rate Optimization
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row row_type="2" page_title="page-title-x" blox_padding_top="50" blox_padding_bottom="50" blox_bgcolor="#f7f7f7"][vc_column width="7/12"][distance type="4"][vc_column_text]

Conversion Rate Optimization

In internet marketing, conversion optimization, or conversion rate optimization (CRO) is a system for increasing the percentage of visitors to a website that convert into customers, or more generally, take any desired action on a webpage. Conversion rate optimization (CRO) is the process of optimizing your sponsored search ads, landing pages, and overall website design to raise your conversion rate. CRO is quickly gaining in popularity because it's seen as a way to increase profits from sales without raising your advertising spends. [/vc_column_text][distance type="5"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/12"][distance type="2"][vc_single_image image="9109" img_size="full" alignment="right" css_animation="bottom-to-top"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][distance][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][distance type="2"][maxtitle type="5" maxtitle_content="What is a Conversion?"][vc_column_text]

A conversion is the specific action you want your web visitor to take on your website or landing page, such as:

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][iconbox type="7" icon_title="Purchasing" icon_name="li_banknote"][distance type="2"][iconbox type="7" icon_title="A button or link click" icon_name="sl-mouse"][distance][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][iconbox type="7" icon_title="Registration" icon_name="sl-user-follow"][distance type="2"][iconbox type="7" icon_title="Downloading brochure" icon_name="sl-cloud-download"][distance][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][iconbox type="7" icon_title="Refer a friend" icon_name="sl-present"][distance type="2"][iconbox type="7" icon_title="Reaching a particular page" icon_name="sl-layers"][distance][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][distance type="2"][vc_single_image image="9752" img_size="full" alignment="center"][distance type="2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][distance type="5"][vc_column_text]

What is Conversion Rate Optimization?

Conversion Rate optimization is an art of generating more and more leads from the targeted audience. Conversion optimization makes your customers pick up the phone and call for a quote. Conversion optimization gets them to click the ‘buy’ button now instead of leaving the tab open for later. By optimizing or improving your web conversion rate you can get more people to take more action without spending money on attracting more visits to your landing page or website. [/vc_column_text][distance type="2"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type="2" blox_bgcolor="#f6f8f9"][vc_column][distance type="4"][maxtitle type="5" maxtitle_content="How We Do"][distance][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type="1"][vc_column][buy_process process_item="%5B%7B%22process_title%22%3A%22Website%20%3Cstrong%3EUsability%3C%2Fstrong%3E%22%2C%22process_content%22%3A%22Increase%20your%20customer%20base%20and%20online%20conversion%20rate%20with%20our%20website%20usability%20services%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-cubes%22%2C%22line_flag%22%3A%221%22%2C%22process_style%22%3A%22default%22%7D%2C%7B%22process_title%22%3A%22Improve%20%3Cstrong%3Esales%20copy%3C%2Fstrong%3E%22%2C%22process_content%22%3A%22We%20can%20craft%20compelling%20sales%20copy%20for%20your%20website%20that%20will%20encourage%20your%20site%20visitors%20to%20convert%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-cog%22%2C%22line_flag%22%3A%222%22%2C%22process_style%22%3A%22default%22%7D%2C%7B%22process_title%22%3A%22conversion%20%3Cstrong%3Efunnel%3C%2Fstrong%3E%22%2C%22process_content%22%3A%22We%20can%20analyze%20your%20conversion%20funnel%20and%20make%20improvements%20to%20increase%20conversion%20rate%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-filter%22%2C%22line_flag%22%3A%223%22%2C%22process_style%22%3A%22featured%22%7D%2C%7B%22process_title%22%3A%22Home%20%3Cstrong%3EOptimization%3C%2Fstrong%3E%22%2C%22process_content%22%3A%22Our%20Landing%20Page%20Optimization%20services%20allow%20us%20to%20optimize%20your%20site%20for%20better%20conversion%20rates%5Cn%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-home%22%2C%22line_flag%22%3A%224%22%2C%22process_style%22%3A%22default%22%7D%2C%7B%22process_title%22%3A%22A%2FB%20%3Cstrong%3ESplit%20Testing%3C%2Fstrong%3E%22%2C%22process_content%22%3A%22We%20provide%20AB%20testing%20experiments%20targeting%20the%20pages%20that%20will%20give%20you%20the%20biggest%20uplift%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-random%22%2C%22line_flag%22%3A%225%22%2C%22process_style%22%3A%22default%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][distance type="5"][distance type="2"][vc_column_text]

Our Approach

  • First, we get to know your business and your goals, so we can determine what the best strategy will be for creating or optimizing your Conversion Rate Optimization.
  • As a conversion rate optimization company, our data-driven A/B tests and further UX improvements look to continuously improve your conversion rates, grow your contacts database, and drive more revenue.
  • We analyze the results from our experiments to understand whether our hypothesis was correct. If a statistical significance has been reached and our hypothesis is correct, we roll out the successful variation of your landing page. If not, we test a new hypothesis and run the whole process again.
[/vc_column_text][distance type="2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][distance type="2"][vc_single_image image="9755" img_size="full" alignment="center"][distance][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type="2" blox_image="9542" blox_padding_bottom="40" blox_dark="true" blox_bgcolor="#77da55"][vc_column width="1/6"][distance type="2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][distance type="5"][distance type="2"][vc_column_text css_animation="appear"]

Our Pricing

CRO packages are based on the amount of pages and testing which is required. Our programs start at $200 per month. Depending on the size and nature of your project a custom proposal will be developed to meet your needs. All rates are negotiable.

[/vc_column_text][distance type="4"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][distance type="5"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][distance][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row blox_class="cntborder"][vc_column width="5/12" css=".vc_custom_1448871957642{background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}"][distance][webnus-divider type="7" lspan="What" rspan="Clients Say" color="#77da55"][distance][vc_column_text]We do not only provide SEO and Internet marketing services but we also offer a wide array of related services such as SEO friendly web design, pay per click, affiliate marketing, website audits, social media optimization, branding and several others.[/vc_column_text][distance][testimonial_slider type="penta"][testimonial_item name="John Anderson" img="8876" subtitle="Risotto Co" testimonial_content="One of the best theme I have ever used. Every minor detail has been taken care of. Clean, Modern Design can be used for any type of website. Excellent template." second_social="instagram"][testimonial_item name="Lida Smith" img="8880" subtitle="Mexin Co" testimonial_content="Lida has assisted me with questions in regards to web hosting and has offered me more insight in half an hour than my current host did in all the years I have been with them." first_social="instagram" second_social="linkedin" third_social="vimeo" fourth_social="pinterest"][/testimonial_slider][distance type="2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/12" css=".vc_custom_1448868540278{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="6/12"][distance][webnus-divider type="7" lspan="Request" rspan="A Free Quote" color="#77da55"][distance][contact-form-7 id="31"][distance type="5"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type="2" blox_padding_top="40" blox_padding_bottom="40" blox_bgcolor="#f9f9f9"][vc_column][distance type="2"][portfolio-carousel title="CASE STUDIES"][distance][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Ecommerce Marketing
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row row_type="2" page_title="page-title-x" blox_padding_top="50" blox_padding_bottom="50" blox_bgcolor="#f7f7f7"][vc_column width="7/12"][distance type="4"][vc_column_text]

Ecommerce Marketing

E-commerce marketing is the practice of guiding online shoppers to an e-commerce website and persuading them to buy the products or services online. A successful e-commerce marketing team needs to have expertise in search engine optimization, pay-per-click marketing, social media marketing, and display advertising to reach the top of search results.[/vc_column_text][distance type="4"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/12"][distance][vc_single_image image="9472" img_size="full" alignment="right" css_animation="bottom-to-top"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][distance][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][distance type="2"][maxtitle type="5" heading="1" maxtitle_content="Our Services"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][distance type="2"][iconbox type="19" icon_title="Search Engine Optimization" iconbox_content="We can help supercharge your SEO initiatives and plan or execute ecommerce SEO campaigns that deliver high ROI." icon_link_text="LEARN MORE" icon_link_url="http://webnus.biz/themes/easyweb/seo/search-engine-optimization/" icon_name="sl-globe-alt"][distance][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][distance type="2"][iconbox type="19" icon_title="Pay Per Click Management" iconbox_content="Bring qualified, targeted shoppers to your ecommerce store with a custom PPC strategy built specifically for your store." icon_link_text="LEARN MORE" icon_link_url="http://webnus.biz/themes/easyweb/seo/pay-per-click/" icon_name="sl-mouse"][distance][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][distance type="2"][iconbox type="19" icon_title="Social Media Optimization" iconbox_content="Our social media optimization services include various large social media networks like Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Google+ etc. " icon_link_text="LEARN MORE" icon_link_url="http://webnus.biz/themes/easyweb/seo/social-media-marketing/" icon_name="sl-share"][distance][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][distance][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][distance type="5"][vc_column_text]

Search engine optimization

Search engine optimization, better known as SEO, is one of the most critical parts of e-commerce marketing. It is based on special algorithms that analyze the instances of specific keywords on your website. Because users navigate the Internet through search engines like Google, these results play a large role in the success of your website. A good SEO campaign can position your e-commerce website to rise to the top of the Google rankings.[/vc_column_text][button btn_content="UNDERSTAND MORE" url="http://webnus.biz/themes/easyweb/seo/search-engine-optimization/"][distance type="2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="8964" img_size="full" alignment="center"][distance type="2"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="5/12"][distance][vc_single_image image="9082" img_size="full" alignment="center"][distance type="2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/12"][distance type="5"][vc_column_text]

Pay-per-click

Pay-per-click advertising operates similarly to SEO since it is based on keywords. However, whereas search engine optimization works organically (meaning that a marketing firm doesn’t have to pay for it), PPC results are the results that show up in yellow boxes on Google.[/vc_column_text][button btn_content="UNDERSTAND MORE" url="http://webnus.biz/themes/easyweb/seo/pay-per-click/"][distance type="2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/12"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][distance type="2"][distance type="4"][vc_column_text]

Social media marketing

Social media marketing can be very important to e-commerce websites. By creating an effective Facebook business page and enticing potential customers to ‘like’ your page with exclusive offers and discounts, you will not only gain immeasurable word-of-mouth advertising through the network, but will establish yourself as a trustworthy, reputable Internet business.

[/vc_column_text][button btn_content="UNDERSTAND MORE" url="http://webnus.biz/themes/easyweb/seo/social-media-marketing/"][distance][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="9072" img_size="full" alignment="center"][distance][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="6/12"][distance type="2"][vc_single_image image="9752" img_size="full" alignment="center"][distance type="2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="4/12"][distance type="5"][distance type="3"][vc_column_text]

Display advertising

Display advertising can be intimidating to smaller Internet retailers, but it has been found to be very worthwhile. By buying small banner ads on related blogs, message boards and other websites, you can showcase your business in front of people who wouldn’t have found it otherwise.[/vc_column_text][distance type="2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/12"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][distance][line][distance][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row blox_class="cntborder"][vc_column width="5/12" css=".vc_custom_1448871957642{background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}"][distance][webnus-divider type="7" lspan="What" rspan="Clients Say" color="#77da55"][distance][vc_column_text]We do not only provide SEO and Internet marketing services but we also offer a wide array of related services such as SEO friendly web design, pay per click, affiliate marketing, website audits, social media optimization, branding and several others.[/vc_column_text][distance][testimonial_slider type="penta"][testimonial_item name="John Anderson" img="8876" subtitle="Risotto Co" testimonial_content="One of the best theme I have ever used. Every minor detail has been taken care of. Clean, Modern Design can be used for any type of website. Excellent template." second_social="instagram"][testimonial_item name="Lida Smith" img="8880" subtitle="Mexin Co" testimonial_content="Lida has assisted me with questions in regards to web hosting and has offered me more insight in half an hour than my current host did in all the years I have been with them." first_social="instagram" second_social="linkedin" third_social="vimeo" fourth_social="pinterest"][/testimonial_slider][distance type="2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/12" css=".vc_custom_1448868540278{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="6/12"][distance][webnus-divider type="7" lspan="Request" rspan="A Free Quote" color="#77da55"][distance][contact-form-7 id="31"][distance type="5"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type="2" blox_padding_top="40" blox_padding_bottom="40" blox_bgcolor="#f9f9f9"][vc_column][distance type="2"][portfolio-carousel title="CASE STUDIES"][distance][/vc_column][/vc_row]

Then they show that show to the people

Well, the way they make shows is, they make one show. That show's called a pilot. Then they show that show to the people who make shows, and on the strength of that one show they decide if they're going to make more shows. Some pilots get picked and become television programs. Some don't, become nothing. She starred in one of the ones that became nothing.
Now we took an oath, that I'm breaking now. We said we'd say it was the snow that killed the other two, but it wasn't. Nature is lethal but it doesn't hold a candle to man.
